columns.name: assembly_id
columns.comment: typedef.json has FK pointing to Assembly without specifying target field; Assumed to reference Assembly.name based on pattern

columns.name: strain_ids
columns.comment: typedef.json has typo with FK pointing to [Strain.Name] with capital N; Using lowercase name to match actual Strain field

columns.name: genome_id
columns.comment: typedef.json has FK pointing to Genome without specifying target field; Assumed to reference Genome.name based on pattern

columns.name: gene_contig_number
columns.comment: indexed starting at 1, as in KBase

columns.name: gene_start
columns.comment: indexed starting at 1, as in KBase

columns.name: genome_id
columns.comment: genome object for sequenced, WT strains
